text: Simple apps and Complex Multicomponent Systems
Java, Objective-C, Swift, C#, HTML5, CSS3
Making your business be more agile and sustainable
Allowing you and your employees to be more proactive and efficient
Getting access to the corporate data and systems on the go
Staying close to your clients and your business wherever you are

Infopulse develops and maintains a huge portfolio of mobile applications for our client with a focus on excellent UX, short learning curve, and ease of customization. The mobile application portfolio includes: reporting dashboards for Top executives, a corporate portal application, a corporate social network for employees to connect with each other, and many more. These apps became everyday tools for over 200,000 company specialists, allowing to improve daily operations and facilitating planning, improving communication and personnel effectiveness.

We designed and supplied a bi-directional data synchronization system, which handles task/time tracking and work reporting. As a result, RRM reduced overhead for routine operations, increased overall level of client service and transparency of work performed.

Infopulse is developing a portfolio of highly effective interactive iPad presentations for pharmaceutical marketing. This app allows getting input from the client, measuring client’s attitude to certain presentations, generating reports etc. Each app is tailored for specific business opportunities, ensuring engagement of the clients and involving them into dialogue by making them interact with the tablet.

Infopulse designed a highly secure P2P mobile communication solution (similar to Viber, WhatsApp or Telegram) that nullifies chances for external data interception or hacking. The application was designed for iOS and Android platforms, allowing our client to drastically increase sales by offering this powerful white label mobile app to new customers and investors.

A cross-platform, multicomponent, enterprise-wide innovative and secure online banking solution, with 24/7 mobile access to the information database. The customer was the first bank in the Nordics to deliver native banking services on iPhone, reporting ~15% growth of customer activity right after application publishing.
